pages.text: $(li)The Ice Spikes is a cold biome which is composed mainly of $(l:patchouli:miscellaneous/vanilla/snow)Snow$(/l) and $(l:patchouli:miscellaneous/vanilla/ice)Ice$(/l).$(br)$(li)It can be found in the Overworld.$(br)$(li)This is a good place to collect $(l:patchouli:miscellaneous/vanilla/packet_ice)Packet Ice$(/l) and $(l:patchouli:miscellaneous/vanilla/snow)Snow$(/l) for your constructions, but you will not find any creature or vegetation here.
$(li)You can search this biome by typing the word $(l)Ice Spikes$() in the search box of the Nature's Compass.
